data.title: My Life in Ruins Similar Movies • FlixPatrol
data.meta_description: Find similar Movies like My Life in Ruins which are popular on Netflix, iTunes, Amazon, Disney+ right now.
data.text:
Anyone But You

Movie | United States | 12/21/2023 | Romance | Rom Com

Bea and Ben look like the perfect couple, but after an amazing first date, something happens that turns their fiery hot attraction ice cold — until they find themselves unexpectedly thrust together at a destination wedding in Australia. So they do what any two mature adults would do - pretend to be a couple.

6.4/10

100,943

The Royal Treatment

Movie | United States | 01/20/2022 | Netflix | Romance | Rom Com

Isabella runs her own salon and isn’t afraid to speak her mind, while Prince Thomas runs his own country and is about to marry for duty rather than love. When Izzy and her fellow stylists get the opportunity of a lifetime to do the hair for the royal wedding, she and Prince Thomas learn that taking control of their own destiny requires following their hearts.

5.2/10

35%

10,627

French Kiss

Movie | United States | 05/05/1995 | Romance | Rom Com

French Kiss is director Kasdan’s best film since the Bodyguard. The plot involves a couple in love and one woman’s attempt to fly to Paris to get her lover back from a business trip and marry him. On the way she unknowingly smuggles something of value that has a petty thief chasing her across France as she chases after her future husband.

6.6/10

48%

How to Survive Your Love

Movie | Czech Republic | 11/09/2023 | Romance | Rom Com

3.7/10

What's Love Got to Do With It?

Movie | United Kingdom | 01/26/2023 | Romance | Rom Com

Two childhood friends now in their thirties must decide whether to follow their heads or their hearts once the man decides to follow his parents' advice and enter into an arranged marriage in Pakistan.

6.6/10

1,487

To All the Boys: Always and Forever

Movie | United States | 02/12/2021 | Netflix | Romance | Rom Com

Senior year of high school takes center stage as Lara Jean returns from a family trip to Korea and considers her college plans — with and without Peter.

Happiness for Beginners

Movie | United States | 07/23/2023 | Netflix | Romance | Rom Com

At a crossroads after her divorce, a schoolteacher ventures toward a fresh start in life — and love — when she signs up for a grueling group hiking trip.

One Day

Movie | United States | 03/02/2011 | Romance | Rom Com

A romantic comedy centered on Dexter and Emma, who first meet during their graduation in 1988 and proceed to keep in touch regularly. The film follows what they do on July 15 annually, usually doing something together.

Notting Hill

Movie | United States | 05/13/1999 | Romance | Rom Com

The British comedy from director Roger Michell tells the love story between a famous actress and a simple book seller from London. A look into the attempt for famous people to have a personal and private life and the ramifications that follow. Nominated for three Golden Globes in 2000.

7.2/10

Trainwreck

Movie | United States | 07/17/2015 | Romance | Rom Com

Having thought that monogamy was never possible, a commitment-phobic career woman may have to face her fears when she meets a good guy.

Love Thing

Movie | Germany | 07/07/2022 | Romance | Rom Com

Red carpet, spotlights, screaming fans, photo- graphers chasing for the best photo, camera teams waiting for interviews - a premiere is about to take place and everyone’s eagerly awaiting to see Germany‘s biggest film star, Marvin Bosch. But Marvin’s nowhere to be seen after his interview with the bitchy tabloid journalist Bettina Bamberger ended in disaster. On the run from the media, the star lands in a small, independent feminist LGBT+ theater called “3000” of all places, which is on the verge of going out of business.

3.6/10

132

Volver

Movie | Spain | 03/16/2006 | Romance | Rom Com

Raimunda (Penélope Cruz) works and lives Madrid with her husband Paco and daughter Paula. Her sister Sole (Lola Duenas) lives nearby and they both miss their mother Irene (Carmen Maura), who died several years ago in a house fire along with their father. A former neighbor from their hometown reports that she has seen the ghost of Irene and both daughters do not believe her. After a murder and a family tragedy, Irene's spirit materializes around her daughters to help comfort them.

7.6/10

Bridget Jones's Diary

Movie | United Kingdom | 04/04/2001 | Romance | Rom Com

Bridget Jones’s Diary is a romantic love story comedy from the best selling novel of the same name by Helen Fielding. A chaotic Jones meets a snobbish lawer named Marc and soon he enters into her world of imperfections.

6.8/10

She's the Man

Movie | United States | 03/17/2006 | Romance | Rom Com

Viola Johnson is in a real jam. Complications threaten her scheme to pose as her twin brother, Sebastian, and take his place at a new boarding school. She falls in love with her handsome roommate, Duke, who loves beautiful Olivia, who has fallen for Sebastian! As if that were not enough, Viola's twin returns from London ahead of schedule but has no idea that his sister has already replaced him on campus.

You've Got Mail

Movie | United States | 12/17/1998 | Romance | Rom Com

In this valentine to modern romance, book superstore magnate Joe Fox and independent book shop owner Kathleen Kelly fall in love in the anonymity of the Internet -- both blissfully unaware that he's trying to put her out of business.

I Love You, Man

Movie | United States | 03/20/2009 | Romance | Rom Com

Peter Klaven is a successful real estate agent who, upon getting engaged to the woman of his dreams, Zooey, discovers, to his dismay and chagrin, that he has no male friend close enough to serve as his Best Man. Peter immediately sets out to rectify the situation, embarking on a series of bizarre and awkward \man-dates,\ before meeting Sydney Fife.

Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason

Movie | United Kingdom | 11/08/2004 | Romance | Rom Com

The story picks up four weeks after the first film, and already Bridget Jones is becoming uncomfortable in her relationship with Mark Darcy. Apart from discovering that he's a conservative voter, she has to deal with a new boss, strange contractor, and the worst vacation of her life.

What Women Want

Movie | United States | 12/14/2000 | Romance | Rom Com

Advertising executive Nick Marshall is as cocky as they come, but what happens to a chauvinistic guy when he can suddenly hear what women are thinking? Nick gets passed over for a promotion, but after an accident enables him to hear women's thoughts, he puts his newfound talent to work against Darcy, his new boss, who seems to be infatuated with him.

6.4/10

A Good Year

Movie | United States | 09/09/2006 | Romance | Rom Com

Max Skinner (Russell Crowe) is a highly successful investment expert with no time for life outside work. When his estranged uncle dies, Max inherits the vineyard in France where he grew up as a child, and his first intention is to sell the vineyard as quickly as possible. But after spending unexpected time at the Vineyard in France, he discovers a part of himself that he had lost and experiences romance and a blossoming new love affair with a beautiful French woman that changes his life forever.

6.9/10

Home Again

Movie | United States | 09/07/2017 | Romance | Rom Com

Life for a single mom in Los Angeles takes an unexpected turn when she allows three young guys to move in with her.

50 First Dates

Movie | United States | 02/13/2004 | Romance | Rom Com

Henry is a player skilled at seducing women. But when this veterinarian meets Lucy, a girl with a quirky problem when it comes to total recall, he realizes its possible to fall in love all over again…and again, and again. Thats because the delightful Lucy has no short-term memory, so Henry must woo her day after day until he finally sweeps her off her feet.

New Year's Eve

Movie | United States | 12/09/2011 | Romance | Rom Com

Bridget Jones's Baby

Movie | United Kingdom | 09/14/2016 | Romance | Rom Com

After breaking up with Mark Darcy, Bridget Jones's 'happily ever after' hasn't quite gone according to plan. Fortysomething and single again, she decides to focus on her job as top news producer and surround herself with old friends and new. For once, Bridget has everything completely under control. What could possibly go wrong? Then her love life takes a turn and Bridget meets a dashing American named Jack, the suitor who is everything Mr. Darcy is not. In an unlikely twist she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch she can only be fifty percent sure of the identity of her baby's father.

6.5/10

78%

968

Letters to Juliet

Movie | United States | 05/14/2010 | Romance | Rom Com

An American girl on vacation in Italy finds an unanswered \letter to Juliet\ -- one of thousands of missives left at the fictional lovers Verona courtyard, which are typically answered by a the \secretaries of Juliet\ -- and she goes on a quest to find the lovers referenced in the letter.

6.5/10

Hitch

Movie | United States | 02/10/2005 | Romance | Rom Com

Dating coach Alex 'Hitch' Hitchens mentors a bumbling client, Albert, who hopes to win the heart of the glamorous Allegra Cole. While Albert makes progress, Hitch faces his own romantic setbacks when proven techniques fail to work on Sara Melas, a tabloid reporter digging for dirt on Allegra Cole's love life. When Sara discovers Hitch's connection to Albert – now Allegra's boyfriend – it threatens to destroy both relationships.

6.6/10

60%

1,472

How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days

Movie | United States | 02/07/2003 | Romance | Rom Com

An advice columnist, Andie Anderson (Kate Hudson), tries pushing the boundaries of what she can write about in her new piece about how to get a man to leave you in 10 days. Her editor, Lana (Bebe Neuwirth), loves it, and Andie goes off to find a man she can use for the experiment. Enter executive Ben Berry (Matthew McConaughey), who is so confident in his romantic prowess that he thinks he can make any woman fall in love with him in 10 days. When Andie and Ben meet, their plans backfire.

6.5/10

42%

3,054

Whatever Works

Movie | France | 06/19/2009 | Romance | Rom Com

Whatever Works explores the relationship between a crotchety misanthrope, Boris and a naive, impressionable young runaway from the south, Melody. When Melody's uptight parents arrive in New York to rescue her, they are quickly drawn into wildly unexpected romantic entanglements. Everyone discovers that finding love is just a combination of lucky chance and appreciating the value of whatever works.

7.2/10

Hysteria

Movie | United States | 11/17/2011 | Romance | Rom Com

A romantic comedy about the invention of the vibrator.

Two Weeks Notice

Movie | United States | 12/18/2002 | Romance | Rom Com

Millionaire real estate developer George Wade doesnt make a move without Lucy Kelson, his multitasking chief counsel and virtual right arm. But after a year of calling the shots, Lucy is giving her two weeks notice. It seems Lucys finally free of George and his 24-hour requests, which included everything from taking care of Georges clothing to handling his divorce settlements. But George has other ideas.

Crazy, Stupid, Love.

Movie | United States | 07/29/2011 | Romance | Midlife Crisis

Cal Weaver is living the American dream. He has a good job, a beautiful house, great children and a beautiful wife, named Emily. Cal's seemingly perfect life unravels, however, when he learns that Emily has been unfaithful and wants a divorce. Over 40 and suddenly single, Cal is adrift in the fickle world of dating. Enter, Jacob Palmer, a self-styled player who takes Cal under his wing and teaches him how to be a hit with the ladies.

Her

Movie | United States | 12/18/2013 | Romance | Fantasy Romance

In the not so distant future, Theodore, a lonely writer purchases a newly developed operating system designed to meet the users every needs. To Theordores surprise, a romantic relationship develops between him and his operating system. This unconventional love story blends science fiction and romance in a sweet tale that explores the nature of love and the ways that technology isolates and connects us all.

Moonrise Kingdom

Movie | United States | 05/25/2012 | Romance | Cry movie

Set on an island off the coast of New England in the summer of 1965, Moonrise Kingdom tells the story of two twelve-year-olds who fall in love, make a secret pact, and run away together into the wilderness. As various authorities try to hunt them down, a violent storm is brewing off-shore – and the peaceful island community is turned upside down in more ways than anyone can handle.

FlixPatrol provides VOD charts and streaming ratings worldwide. You can find here all the Netflix charts (Netflix TOP 10 or what is Trending on Netflix), iTunes charts, Amazon Prime charts and HBO charts. These movie charts are based on the official trending or the most popular movies on VOD. We cover the most-watched movies and the most popular TV shows in 2021. FlixPatrol also offers selected movie analytics for movies everyone’s watching or VOD release dates. TOP 10 lists are updated daily.
